Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer. Considering its exceptional value and the benefits it provides, I'm offering it to you for $150. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, so don't miss out! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
